attributes.action: Call for Jeremy Hunt to resign as health secretary.
attributes.background: As Jeremy Hunt has shown in the last few weeks, he is incapable of fulfilling his roll as health secretary. Following the plea of junior doctors across the UK to provide a better work contract for the betterment of the whole NHS, he has arrogantly dismissed the seriousness of the situation.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
